name: real ninja war
description:
Description:

This is a simple multiplayer platformer for playing with friends. You have to fight here on a small map using different abilities. Every death will be given to you by random abilities. Each ability uses a chakra that automatically recovers (faster if you are not moving).

Also in this game there is one common server for 20 people, so that all players will knead each other on the same map

How to install:

Just unzip the archive and run nw.exe

Controls:

WAD - Move

LMB - Throw kunai

RMB - Open ability menu

SPACE - throw explosive scroll
